ygData.subject: RE: Here's a clip from the elite Innoruuk guild.
ygData.msgSnippet: we got a lot of flack on our server when our guild was formed.  i won t lie, we have the same kind of effort.  the guild was formed to do events and be able to
ygData.messageBody:
we got a lot of flack on our server when our guild was formed. i won't lie,
we have the same kind of effort. the guild was formed to do events and be
able to do them in one guild without all the organizing that we used to have
to do that took so long. many of the most experienced players from several
different guilds got together and started this one. the difference may be
that we are at least civil. when the servers crashed a couple days ago,
obviously people were going to make runs at the dragons ASAP. we were going
to go to nag, had everyone at lavastorm, and found out that there were
groups forming inside that had been at FGs before the crash, and decided to
go after Nag while there. obviously they could not plan on doing nag since
the crash was unexpected, and no FG group could ever do Nag, but they had
plans in motion and people there, so we did Vox instead. the next day when
the servers crashed again (may they crash every day!) again we made an
agreement to alternate the dragons we did last time. and both times we were
done many hours before the other guild(s) were, and if we were so inclined
could have walked in and did the other dragon if we really wanted to, but
what's right is right.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L35 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server




> This is very typical, btw. LoD will barge in and take over
> anything from anybody, even if plans are made. This was
> after a lot of people posted the fall of Cazic, where LoD
> failed to drop him.
